admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
In addition to providing medium- and
            long-term loans for the purchase of farm machinery and the
            development of small private irrigation schemes and
            fishponds which were included in the first project, the
            second project would also finance the purchase of on-farm
            storage and processing facilities, equipment and production
            stock for livestock development, and small fishing boats and
            fishing equipment. A total of some 6-7000 beneficiaries are
            expected to participate in the project.
